about_the_game:
Salute General! Experience an intense real-time strategy game inspired by the classics of the genre, where three powerful factions battle for control over the mysterious and immensely valuable resource, Veranite. Lead the advanced forces of the Majestic Steel Command, wield the futuristic technologies of the Omega Ascendancy, or fight with the unconventional tactics of the World Resistance Legion to achieve global domination.

With deep strategy, massive armies, and cutting-edge weaponry alongside unique special abilities, Tactical Domination delivers thrilling multiplayer battles and captivating challenges. Build bases, gather resources, and determine the fate of the world in this high-stakes conflict!

Dynamic Single-Player Challenges

  • Test your strategic skills in exciting solo scenarios.

Classic Multiplayer Experience

  • Engage in action-packed tactical battles against other players, keeping you on the edge of your seat until the very last second.

Diverse AI Battles

  • Challenge AI opponents at various difficulty levels and master unique scenarios—whether solo or as practice for multiplayer matches.

Varied Battlefields and Terrain Types

  • Fight across diverse maps and terrain settings, requiring adaptable strategies and quick thinking to handle changing conditions.

Factions with Unique Abilities

  • Choose between the technologically advanced forces of the Majestic Steel Command, the futuristic arsenal of the Omega Ascendancy, or the unconventional tactics of the World Resistance Legion.

Special Abilities and Cutting-Edge Technology

  • Deploy unique units and abilities from each faction to gain tactical advantages and unlock new strategic possibilities for your team.

Base Building and Resource Management

  • Construct and expand bases, secure the valuable Veranite resource, and ensure your army is always battle-ready.

Experience an intense real-time strategy game inspired by the classics of the genre, where three powerful factions battle for control over the mysterious and immensely valuable resource, Veranite. Lead the advanced forces of the Majestic Steel Command, wield the futuristic technologies of the Omega Ascendancy, or fight with the unconventional tactics of the World Resistance Legion to achieve global domination.

With deep strategy, massive armies, and cutting-edge weaponry alongside unique special abilities, Tactical Domination delivers thrilling multiplayer battles and captivating challenges. Build bases, gather resources, and determine the fate of the world in this high-stakes conflict!

name: Tactical Domination: Operation Veranite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X with 2 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 with 4–6 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard

short_description: Command one of three distinct factions in a fierce battle for the enigmatic resource Veranite. Utilize powerful units and strategic abilities to vie for complete supremacy. The destiny of the future lies in your hands.
